posts.title: Extreme Water Tag
posts.content: Drenched and humiliated – that’s exactly what the opposition will feel like after a fierce game of extreme water tag. The vests adjust to fit all body types and features a water gauge sensor that releases a big and very wet explosion that goes off once an enemy has been fatally shot.

posts.title: Alarm Clock Rug
posts.content: Win the daily battle against the snooze button by upgrading to this alarm clock rug. The ingenious design forces you to place both of your feet on the soft memory foam rug for at least 3 seconds in order to turn the alarm clock off.

posts.title: Solar Powered Light Up Bricks
posts.content: Create a magical nighttime environment by lighting your pathway using these solar powered light up bricks. These bricks are designed to stand up to adverse weather conditions and provide an excellent source of alternative lighting that won’t drive up the electric bill.

posts.title: Emergency Hangry Snack Box
posts.content: Keep yourself feeling happy and your belly feeling full with the emergency hangry snack box. This very generous care package comes chock-full of delectable goodies like beef jerky, nuts, protein bars, and potato chips.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Fish
posts.content: Add some color to your home with these incredible glow in the dark tetra fish. These tiny aquatic pets are available in one of six amazingly vibrant colors like electric green and starfire red – making them a brilliant addition to any fresh water aquarium.

posts.title: Giant Playing Cards
posts.content: Ease the tension during your next high stakes game by swapping your old deck for these giant playing cards. These comically oversized cards measure an impressive 8.25 x 11.75 inches – making them ideal for magic tricks or constructing a massive house of cards.

posts.title: LED Sneakers
posts.content: Light up the streets with your great fashion sense by wearing a pair of LED sneakers. These eye-catching kicks sport a wrap-around LED band that can be customized with one of seven colors so you can match them with any outfit.

posts.title: The Underachiever’s Manifesto
posts.content: Get on the path to achieving true happiness in life by studying the wise words found in The Underachiever’s Manifesto. It extols the virtues of mediocrity with sharp humor and genuine wisdom so you can learn how to effectively lower the bar and live life to the least.

posts.title: Giant Brachiosaurus Dinosaur Statue
posts.content: Turn your backyard into your very own private Jurassic Park with this giant Brahiosaurus dinosaur statue. Cast in quality designer resin, this massive 314 pound hand painted dino statue stands over 15 feet tall and masterfully depicts the now extinct 80 ton beast.

posts.title: Mini Electric Dirt Bike
posts.content: Dive head first into the world of extreme sports by riding on this mini electric dirt bike. The bike features authentic Jeremy McGrath graphics and Fairing design and can reach speeds of 15 MPH making it ideal for young daredevils in training.

posts.title: Anti-Fatigue Gaming Glasses
posts.content: Keep your eyes fresh long into your marathon gaming session by going in with these anti-fatigue gaming glasses. Weighing only 25 grams, they feature a proprietary coating that blocks out high-energy blue light, glare and UV.

posts.title: Game Of Thrones Dragon Eggs Set
posts.content: Feel as proud as the Mother of Dragons when you take home the Game Of Thrones dragon eggs set. These resin eggs feature intricate detailing to achieve an authentic look and come encased in an elegant wooden box lined with silk for maximum protection.
